vsParam:
Oh, found it!
Excuse me! The lady over there~

Coming and I'm not the lady over there... I'm Erika.
You seem in a hurry...
What can "Fever Weaver" Caravan do for you?

Here's the thing. We need this ingredient.
Is there any chance that your caravan has it?

Yeah, sure.
We've got anything you want, hehe.

But the inventory is tight,
so the price may be a bit higher...

How much have you got?
I forgot to bring my purse...
I bought a lot of desserts yesterday, so I'm broke now...
I spent my money on books...

Um~~ What do we do... We can't make medicine
for Netl without this ingredient~

... It seems you have a pretty tricky problem.
Can you elaborate on it?

Head Fever!? Oh, guys.
This is the Head of our caravan, Feverfew.

Um, the Head!?
Uh, here is the thing...

Hey! You offered to help a brother and sister
you met on your road! It's fever!

Yeah, that's touching... Oh. I didn't expect to hear something
so warm in this fickle world...

Ah, um... Hmm.
Anyway, that ingredient is exactly what we need...
I see! Wrap it up. Just take this away!

Huhâ€”!? N-no way!
We can't just take it for nothing...

Yeah!
Let us do something for you at least!

Come on, you guys really got fever!
This world is still hopeful, Erika!

Yeah, that's right!
... If you insist, could you help me with that?

Yeah, you're the perfect people to do that. Everyone,
please do something for me in exchange for the ingredient!

It's been raining nonstop. My pasture is rotting.
The horses in the caravan are starving.

Yeah, so...
Could you please help us get some horse fodder?

Oh yeah? That's really fever!
We're counting on you!
